# Choose Your Adventure - How to choose the right visualization for your data

Gee Hyun Kwon (gk2575), Angela Simei Li (sl4525)

Graphs and charts help us understand data better, but it isn’t always clear exactly how to choose the right visualization. We have developed a 3-step process “choose your adventure” to help you navigate through your next data visualization problem at hand.king EDAV.info as motivation, we have added self-written and consolidated code snippets with appropriate references.
